Package edu.wpi.grip.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Connection.Factory<T>  
    Operation
    The common interface used by Steps in a pipeline to call various operations.
    PreviousNext
    An Object that can switch its value.
    Source.SourceFactory  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection<T>
    A connection is a rule that causes one socket to update to always the value of another socket.
    GRIPCoreModule
    A Guice Module for GRIP's core package.
    InputSocket<T>
    Represents the input into an Operation.
    Main
    Main driver class for headless mode
    OutputSocket<T>
    Represents the output of an Operation.
    Palette
    The palette is a library of operations that can be added as steps in the Pipeline
    Pipeline
    Pipeline has the list of steps in a computer vision algorithm, as well as the set of connections between the inputs and outputs of different steps.
    PipelineRunner
    Runs the pipeline in a separate thread.
    Socket<T>
    A Socket is an abstract wrapper for a value that can be updated and passed around operations.
    SocketHint<T>
    A SocketHint is a descriptor that gives some information about one of the inputs or outputs of an Operation.
    SocketHint.Builder<T>  
    SocketHints
    Commonly used SocketHints
    SocketHints.Inputs
    These SocketHints should only be used in InputSockets
    SocketHints.Outputs
    These SocketHints should only be used in InputSockets
    Source
    Base class for an input into the pipeline.
    Source.SourceFactoryImpl  
    Step
    A step is an instance of an operation in a pipeline.
    Step.Factory  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Operation.Category  
    Socket.Direction  
    SocketHint.View  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    NoSocketTypeLabel
    By default, the GUI shows labels for the type of each socket based on Class.getSimpleName().
